select count(*) from ( select a.deptname as Name, a.productName,sum(a.ffje) as jkje ,count(a.ywbh) as countSx,sum(a.df) as total from (select distinct tkmx.ywbh,base.khmc,protype.product_name as productName,sysuser.display_name,DeptName.name as deptname,tkmx.jkrq,shlx.df ,tkmx.ffje from ( select sum(lsz.df) as df ,tkmx.ywbh as ywbh from ty_customer_rygl rygl, ty_customer_base base, ty_product_type protype, ty_repay_tkmx tkmx, SYS_USER sysuser , ty_repay_yehz yehz, ty_repay_lsz lsz where base.khjl=rygl.dm and rygl.ddrq=sysuser.external_id and base.khnm=tkmx.khh and tkmx.JJH=yehz.JJH and protype.product_code=tkmx.cpmc and lsz.jjh=tkmx.jjh and lsz.zy='批量自动扣利息' group by tkmx.ywbh ) shlx, ( select distinct t.name,sysuser.id from sys_department t,sys_dept_user tt,sys_user sysuser where t.id=tt.dept_id and sysuser.id=tt.user_id) DeptName, ty_customer_rygl rygl, ty_customer_base base, ty_product_type protype, ty_repay_tkmx tkmx, SYS_USER sysuser , ty_repay_yehz yehz, ty_kdk_jh jh, ty_repay_lsz lsz WHERE base.khjl=rygl.dm and rygl.ddrq=sysuser.external_id and base.khnm=tkmx.khh and tkmx.JJH=yehz.JJH and protype.product_code=tkmx.cpmc and jh.ywbh=tkmx.ywbh||'HT' and lsz.jjh=tkmx.jjh and shlx.ywbh=tkmx.ywbh and DeptName.id=sysuser.id order by tkmx.jkrq ) a where 1=1
and a.JKRQ=#{fdate}
and productName like '%'||#{product}||'%'
group by a.deptname, a.productName order by nlssort (a.deptname ,'nls_sort=schinese_pinyin_m'))

select sum(b.countSx) as countSx,sum(b.total) as totalSX from ( select a.deptname as Name, a.productName,sum(a.ffje) as jkje ,count(a.ywbh) as countSx,sum(a.df) as total from (select distinct tkmx.ywbh,base.khmc,protype.product_name as productName,sysuser.display_name,DeptName.name as deptname,tkmx.jkrq,shlx.df ,tkmx.ffje from ( select sum(lsz.df) as df ,tkmx.ywbh as ywbh from ty_customer_rygl rygl, ty_customer_base base, ty_product_type protype, ty_repay_tkmx tkmx, SYS_USER sysuser , ty_repay_yehz yehz, ty_repay_lsz lsz where base.khjl=rygl.dm and rygl.ddrq=sysuser.external_id and base.khnm=tkmx.khh and tkmx.JJH=yehz.JJH and protype.product_code=tkmx.cpmc and lsz.jjh=tkmx.jjh and lsz.zy='批量自动扣利息' group by tkmx.ywbh ) shlx, ( select distinct t.name,sysuser.id from sys_department t,sys_dept_user tt,sys_user sysuser where t.id=tt.dept_id and sysuser.id=tt.user_id) DeptName, ty_customer_rygl rygl, ty_customer_base base, ty_product_type protype, ty_repay_tkmx tkmx, SYS_USER sysuser , ty_repay_yehz yehz, ty_kdk_jh jh, ty_repay_lsz lsz WHERE base.khjl=rygl.dm and rygl.ddrq=sysuser.external_id and base.khnm=tkmx.khh and tkmx.JJH=yehz.JJH and protype.product_code=tkmx.cpmc and jh.ywbh=tkmx.ywbh||'HT' and lsz.jjh=tkmx.jjh and shlx.ywbh=tkmx.ywbh and DeptName.id=sysuser.id
and tkmx.JKRQ=#{fdate}
and protype.product_name like '%'||#{product}||'%'
order by tkmx.jkrq ) a group by a.deptname, a.productName order by nlssort (a.deptname ,'nls_sort=schinese_pinyin_m') ) b

SELECT DeptName.Name as Name FROM ( select distinct t.name,sysuser.id from sys_department t,sys_dept_user tt,sys_user sysuser where t.id=tt.dept_id and sysuser.id=tt.user_id) DeptName, BASIC_CUSTOMER_INFORMATION A, ty_customer_base base, ty_product_type protype, ty_repay_tkmx tkmx, SYS_USER sysuser , ty_repay_yehz yehz, ty_kdk_jh jh WHERE A .USER_ID=sysuser.id and A.TY_CUSTOMER_ID=base.id and base.khnm=tkmx.khh and tkmx.JJH=yehz.JJH and protype.product_code=tkmx.cpmc and substr(jh.ywbh,1,length(jh.ywbh)-2)=tkmx.ywbh and DeptName.id=sysuser.id group by DeptName.Name
select DISPLAY_NAME as displayName from SYS_USER

select g.GUARANTOR_MORTGAGOR_PLEDGE,b.CHINESE_NAME,info.APPLY_QUOTA from CUSTOMER_APPLICATION_GUARANTOR g, BASIC_CUSTOMER_INFORMATION b, CUSTOMER_APPLICATION_INFO info where b.ID=info.CUSTOMER_ID and info.ID=g.MAIN_APPLICATION_FORM_ID
and info.ID=#{infoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select count(*) from CUSTOMER_APPLICATION_GUARANTOR t where 1=1
and t.MAIN_APPLICATION_FORM_ID=#{infoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select g.GUARANTOR_MORTGAGOR_PLEDGE,b.CHINESE_NAME,b.ID,info.APPLY_QUOTA from CUSTOMER_APPLICATION_GUARANTOR g, BASIC_CUSTOMER_INFORMATION b, CUSTOMER_APPLICATION_INFO info where b.ID=info.CUSTOMER_ID and info.ID=g.MAIN_APPLICATION_FORM_ID and info.ID in( select g.MAIN_APPLICATION_FORM_ID from CUSTOMER_APPLICATION_GUARANTOR g where 1=1 and g.DOCUMENT_NUMBER in( select CARD_ID from BASIC_CUSTOMER_INFORMATION b where 1=1
and b.ID=#{customerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ))
